snippet: President Mahinda Rajapaksa of Sri Lanka faces a serious election challenge, and his astrologer, who acts as spiritual adviser and political consultant, is wary of bad results.
abstract: Sri Lankan Pres Mahinda Rajapaksa faces strong competition in his re-election bid in January, and his astrologer Sumanadasa Abeygunawardena faces ultimate test of his skills in pointing out auspicious timing for Rajapaksa's political acts; astrologer acts as Rajapaksa's spiritual adviser, political consultant and life coach.
lead_paragraph: President Mahinda Rajapaksa of Sri Lanka faces a serious election challenge, and his astrologer, who acts as spiritual adviser and political consultant, is wary of bad results.

headline.main: As Vote Nears, Astrologer for Sri Lanka’s President Faces Ultimate Test of His Skills
headline.print_headline: As Vote Nears, Astrologer for Sri Lanka’s President Faces Ultimate Test of His Skills
